name: node-txgit
description: Micro node app for listening to Transifex web hooks, automatically committing it to git and pushing to a remote.

GIT_REPO_URL.description: Your git repo url. Should include credentials if it's a private repo.

LOCALE_DIR.description: The directory where the locale files will be saved within the repo.

LOCALE_EXT.description: The extension you want to use for the translation file.

GIT_NAME.description: The name used for the git commits.

GIT_EMAIL.description: The email used for the git commits.
